title: Happy Memorial Day, Black People Excuses, Vacationing While Working, Old School Dating and more.
itunes:title: Happy Memorial Day, Black People Excuses, Vacationing While Working, Old School Dating and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  We have the best and worst summer jobs just for you.  The crew discuss checking into work while on vacation.  Right here are the excuses Black people make to not get in the pool.  Steve and Tommy are asked if they have ever had the wrong thought at the wrong time.  Is old school relationship advice still good today.  Steve definitely tells the best stories especially when it comes to Slick.  The CLO has a situation that goes against condomnsense.  Have you ever heard the excuses Black people make to not go in the pool?  Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog warns us about the one job that the devil has.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
